page.title: 05ECOLOGY
page.content: WE DID A SURVEY ON LITTER.THE RESULTS SHOWED THAT OUT OF 80 PEOPLE 21 MADE AN EFFORT TO FIND A BIN,46 PUT THEIR LITTER IN POCKETS AND 21 DROPPED THE LITTER ON THE FLOOR.WE THEN ASKED THE CHILDREN AT SCHOOL WHAT THEY DO WITH THEIR LITTER.OUT OF 133 CHILDREN 54 PUT LITTER IN THEIR POCKETS,44 FOUND A BIN AND 35 DROPPED IT ON THE FLOOR. WE DID A SURVEY ON SMOKING.OUT OF 80 PEOPLE QUESTIONED ONLY 36 SMOKED.MOST OF THE SMOKERS WERE AGED 25-50,MOST SMOKED 25 A DAY.WE ASKED THE CHILDREN AT SCHOOL WHETHER THE ADULTS IN THEIR FAMILIES SMOKED OR NOT.OUT OF 400 ADULTS 209 SMOKED.OF THE 191 NON- SMOKERS,111 WERE FEMALE.WE ASKED OUR 13 TEACHERS THE SAME QUESTION AND ONLY 1 MALE SMOKED.THE REST COULDN'T AFFORD TO,REFLECTING TEACHER'S PAY.
